title: Sample, 1956
medium:
Medium: synthetic fiber
Technique: herringbone weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 22.2 x 17.1 cm (8 3/4 x 6 3/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description:
Asymmetrical horizontal 2 and 2 herringbone with paired warps and 2 and 2 herringbone paired wefts.
Warp: paired brown 2 ply yarn with stripes of 4 rows of paired orange 2 ply yarn.
Weft: white synthetic plied with metallic yarn.

tombstone.epitaph:
